alert.note: Alert for Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 4:00PM EST until December 24 at 10:26AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Pemigewasset River At Woodstock affecting Grafton County. Pemigewasset River At Plymouth affecting Grafton and Belknap Counties. For the Pemigewasset River...including Woodstock, Plymouth...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pemigewasset River at Woodstock. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. At 11.0 feet, Route 175 floods to a depth of 1 foot at Cox Farm Road in Woodstock. Campgrounds along the river also flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM EST Friday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 9.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
